name: Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey v.219
description: It's the ideal companion of some others of my Flickr Userstyles. Add a Dark Gray Flavor for my Flickr Userstyles. To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen" together in one shot: On USw NEW 2021.07: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE OR you can use my userscript [Greasyfork]: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: ►► Find all my Userstyles for Flickr in different places: A - decembre (UserStyles.org): Traditional place to share our userstyle... but became worst now (slower). B - decembre [userstyles.world - USw]: The best alternative (faster) to the - now buggy - Userstyles.org. A new place to share our userstyles, provided by very good devs ! C - decembre [UserStyles.org Archive] Archived Mirror of Userstyles.org And as Userscripts /UserCSS on: D - decembre [GreasyFork] ▶ All My "Flickr WideScreen" styles: Initially, due an Uerstyles.org size limit, it was need to split it in 3 parts: - Flickr Widescreen (Part 1): The first and principal to install. - Flickr WideScreen (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - Flickr WideScreen - Dark and Grey: Dark and Gray flavor But,for a better results, it's recommended to install these 3 userstyles together in one shot). You have 2 alternatives. UserStyles World (USw): Flickr WideScreen - BigONE [UserStyles World (USw)] OR GreasyFork: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE [GreasyFork] About this new function in GreasyFork, read: [Beta] User CSS support ► You can test my other Usertyles (For now, always on usertyles.org). Many are better for A WIDE SCREEN (1920x1080)!. - For Pool BETA (2020): Flickr WideScreen - Pool No Beta - Small - For Favorites (2020): Flickr WideScreen Favorites (Small) - For Flickr Viewers : Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - DACKR Viewer Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FlickRiver Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ▶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : ► My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (avr 2015)) - Updated 2020. I have Updated all links from userscripts.org (defunct) , to point now to userscripts-mirror.org (Archives)). ►► More infos and screenshots: All my Userstyles for Flickr: Photo Page with all my Tweaks [Flickr] And : [userstyles] "Flickr WideScreen & BigONE" [in Flickr Hacks
